post.title: port blocking and blocking content is illegal with wireless as per crtc ruling
post.content: on june 30th 2010 the crtc ruled on telecom decision crtc 2010-445 this means port blocking is illegal. it is also illegal for wireless providers to slow (throttle) time sensitive data like voip or video conferencing ect.. http://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/n...e-data-too.ars http://www.crtc.gc.ca/eng/archive/2010/2010-445.htm
